question: Which country houses the "Jatiluhur Dam"?
explanation: Indonesia houses the "Jatiluhur Dam". The Jatiluhur Dam is a multi-purpose embankment dam on the Citarum River in West Java, Indonesia. The dam serves several purposes including the provision of hydroelectric power generation, water supply, flood control, irrigation and aquaculture. The Jatiluhur reservoir helps irrigate 240,000 ha of rice fields. The earth-fill dam is 105 m high and withholds a reservoir of 3,000,000,000 m3, the largest in the country.
